Texts.Eng: Try building a few more basic goods such as the extremely useful ^orange;Extraction Lab^reset;. The ^orange;Machining Table^reset; and its ^green;upgrades^reset; are necessary for every FU crafting station. Use it well.

You've taken your first steps in ^cyan;Frackin' Universe^reset;. With the ^orange;Machining Table^reset; you can now branch out into a wide assortment of ^green;Lab Stations and Equipment^reset; as well as ^green;crafting resources^reset;. Let's start by making an ^orange;Electromagnet^reset;.
